articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: Nigel Farage offers to work with Peter Mandelson to secure US-UK trade deal
articles.description: Labour party divided on whether incoming US ambassador should lean on Reform leader’s ties with Donald Trump
articles.content:
Nigel Farage has said he would be willing to help Peter Mandelson negotiate with the Trump administration, after the Labour grandee was confirmed as Westminster’s new ambassador to the US.

articles.author: CBC.ca
articles.title: Alberta Premier Danielle Smith to attend inauguration of Donald Trump
articles.description: The move comes in the wake of threats from Trump, who has said he would impose 25 per cent tariffs if Canada and Mexico do not handle the flow of illegal immigrants and drugs.
articles.content:
Premier Danielle Smith will attend the second inauguration of U.S. president-elect Donald Trump in January, her office has confirmed.

articles.author: Newsweek
articles.title: Toyota Joins Ford in Donating $1 Million to Trump's Inauguration
articles.description: Toyota followed Ford's lead and donated $1 million towards President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration in January.
articles.content:
What's New?
Toyota followed Ford's lead and donated $1 million toward President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration in January, The Hill reported.

articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: Trump criticises Biden's death row decisions - saying he backs capital punishment for 'rapists, murderers, and monsters'
articles.description: Mr Trump was responding to President Joe Biden's decision to reduce the sentences of almost all federal inmates on death row to life imprisonment - whom Mr Trump called "37 of the worst killers in our country".
articles.content:
Donald Trump says that when he takes power next month he will direct the US Justice Department to "vigorously pursue" the death penalty.
The US president-elect, 78, said he would do so to protect Americans from what he called "violent rapists, murder... [2784 chars]

articles.author: Salon
articles.title: "They let him walk": Merrick Garland's DOJ under fire after damning Matt Gaetz report released
articles.description: Justice Department leaders decided against prosecuting Trump ally — and obstructed congressional ethics probe.
articles.content: Attorney General Merrick Garland declined to prosecute former Rep. Matt Gaetz, R-Fla., despite a trail of text messages and testimony from seemingly scores of women detailing the Republican lawmaker’s alleged penchant for buying sex, including from a... [8716 chars]

articles.title: Denmark to boost defence spending for Greenland after Trump repeats call for US control
articles.description: The Danish defence minister said the package would amount to a "double-digit billion amount" in krone, or at least $1.5bn (£1.2bn).
articles.content:
Denmark has announced plans to boost its defence spending for Greenland with a "stronger presence in the Arctic" - a few hours after Donald Trump repeated his call for the US to buy the vast island.
